Articles.Content: Hello all! I've been lurking these forums for some time now but have yet to come out and introduce myself. My handle is Lt Whiskers and I've been playing ksp for the last year or so (since .25). I had taken a recent break from the game but with 1.02 out now, I'm being quickly sucked back into a highly infatuated orbit. Right now I'm working on upgrading/combining my previous designs into a solid interplanetary ship capable of completing long journeys (Jool 5 challenge types, for instance) with the new features of 1.0. In the past I've dabbled with colonization projects, mining and life support mods, and even some stock space warfare thanks to Macey Dean's inspirational videos. Anyway, I hope to get some good craft files up soon and, as always, enjoy the awesomeness that this community continues to produce for its members.

Getting to the big ships, eh? Be sure to bring an ample supply of cookies! In fact, we have some over here. Some beverages over there as well, pizzas on the way...

Oh, and I guess welcome and all the jazz.
Thank you all! There will be cookies AND pizza aboard! Also beer for the crew.
